result.eng: Would you like to watch television?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifís
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifís
result.html: Ar mhaith leat amharc ar an teilifísWould you like to watch television?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat aṁarc ar an teilifísWould you like to watch television?

result.eng: It would better to stay out of view.
result.html: B'fhearr fanacht as amharcIt would better to stay out of view.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr fanaċt as aṁarcIt would better to stay out of view.

result.eng: The contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ga: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.orig: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.html: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart aṁarc go géar ar an ċonraḋ arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.

result.ga: Bhí mé ag amharc thart
result.html: Bhí mé ag amharc thartI was looking around.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag aṁarc ṫartI was looking around.

result.eng: Do you have any time to watch TV at all?
result.ga: An mbíonn an t-am agat le bheith ag amharc ar an teilifís ar chor ar bith
result.orig: An mbíonn an t-am agat le bheith ag amharc ar an teilifís ar chor ar bith
result.html: An mbíonn an t-am agat le bheith ag amharc ar an teilifís ar chor ar bithDo you have any time to watch TV at all?
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn an t-am agat le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar an teilifís ar ċor ar biṫDo you have any time to watch TV at all?

result.eng: I watch TV till late at night.
result.ga: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.orig: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oíche
result.html: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís go deireanach san oícheI watch TV till late at night.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís go deireanaċ san oíċeI watch TV till late at night.

result.eng: I usually stay in Monday night, watching TV.
result.ga: Fanaim istigh oíche Luain de ghnáth ag amharc ar an teilifís
result.orig: Fanaim istigh oíche Luain de ghnáth ag amharc ar an teilifís
result.html: Fanaim istigh oíche Luain de ghnáth ag amharc ar an teilifísI usually stay in Monday night, watching TV.
result.ponchtml: Fanaim istiġ oíċe Luain de ġnáṫ ag aṁarc ar an teilifísI usually stay in Monday night, watching TV.

result.eng: I watch TV. I surf the internet as well.
result.ga: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maith
result.orig: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maith
result.html: Bím ag amharc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon chomh maithI watch TV. I surf the internet as well.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag aṁarc ar an teilifís Bím ag scimeáil ar an idirlíon ċoṁ maiṫI watch TV. I surf the internet as well.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
